page.title: 14Inverkeithing Highland Games
page.content:
{Inverkeithing Highland Games}
While it is not exactly in the Highlands, Inverkeithing holds it's games every August at about the same time as the{Lammas Fair.}The games take place on the{Ballast Bank}sports ground, early in August.
{Dalgety Bay Gala
This annual event takes place late in{ {July,}usually on the cricket pitch behind Donibristle House. The gala is run by{Dalgety Bay Community Council} and the many organisations in Dalgety Bay, cubs, scouts, B.B.s, guides, Sailing Club and the Parish Church organise stalls and sideshows.
